column5: I drove down to my usuall area for chromies, looked at the waves and said no way, its not looking good out there. So I hung a right and ventured on.  I launched and headed to the stomping grounds that very few spoke about. My target was walters. I found them, seen them on the ff, had them follow as well For what? None of them to nibble at all I ran one line on a rigger and the other was lead core. The rigger line twitched a few times so I brought it up A little wee smallie on a lure its own size. At least I didnt get skunked and I know now some tails are actual truths in a manner of speaking. The waves told me another story, so it was time to get out.
